briefTitle: Postoperative Opt-In Narcotics Treatment in Breast
officialTitle: Postoperative Opt-In Narcotics Treatment in Breast
conditions: Breast Cancer, Breast Surgery, Opioid Use
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Daily peak pain scores on an 11-point numeric rating scale [0-10, with 0 indicating no pain and 10 indicating worst pain possible]
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Undergoing outpatient breast surgery (less than 24 hour stay)
* Understands written English

Exclusion Criteria:

* Current ongoing opioid use
* Increased complexity of surgery requiring longer hospital stay
